participant_1.background:
My biggest challenge was having to work from home and not being able to interact with my colleagues in person.
I am a software engineer who loves Halloween and pasta.
I love the peace and quiet of the suburbs, and I enjoy the fact that I can walk my dogs in the park without having to worry about traffic.
i have always enjoyed telling stories to people.
i am afraid of clowns.

participant_2.background:
I care about social media enough to stay connected with my friends but not enough to let it take over my life.
i am a night owl.
i was born in san francisco.
I am trying to quit smoking for the sake of my baby.
my class has 26 kids.

content.text: Hi there, how are you doing today?
Not bad, thanks! Just finished teaching a class of 26 kids.
Oh wow, that sounds like a lot of work! What grade do you teach?
I teach kindergarten, so it can be pretty crazy at times.
I bet! I know kids can be a handful sometimes.
Yeah, but they're also really cute and funny.
That's true. I love hearing their little stories.
Me too! I'm trying to quit smoking for the sake of my baby.
Oh, that's good to hear! I'm sure your baby will appreciate it.
I hope so! I'm not sure how I'm going to do it, but I'm going to try my best.
You can do it! I believe in you.
Thanks! I appreciate that.
No problem! So, what do you do for fun?
I love to go out dancing and spend time with my friends.
Sounds like fun! I like to stay in and watch movies.
I don't get to do that too often, but it sounds like a nice way to relax.
It is. I love to watch horror movies.
Oh, I'm not a fan of horror movies. They scare me too much.
I love the adrenaline rush!
I can understand that.
So, what's your favorite movie?
I don't know if I have a favorite movie. I like a lot of different types of movies.
Same here. I like to watch a variety of movies.
I think it's important to keep an open mind when it comes to movies.
I agree. You never know what you might like.
Exactly
